email.text:
Dear all DoCSoc Mums and Dads,
Just to let you know, we’ve started to allocate all families with children and the DoCSoc MaD event takes place very soon. So please start contacting the children you’ve been allocated so far and start making some group chats to help support them as they begin their transition to university.
Please remember that we might reallocate your children if you do not engage with them.
Kind regards,
DoCSoc
